tgt_original: sarvadiktryadhvasaṃbhūtabuddhānāṃ purataḥ sthitaḥ |  hṛtprabhodbhavarūpādyaiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā vidhānataḥ ||10 ||  svāsatsaṃkalpamātrotthaṃ tryadhvajaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam |  svapnasvapnādivat sarvaṃ triṣkṛtvā deśayāmyaham ||11 ||
śuddhaniḥśeṣasaṃkalpān pratyātmānandavedinaḥ |  saṃbuddhān śaraṇaṃ yāmi svaparārthaphalapradān ||14 ||  satsattvāśeṣasaddharmamāgamādhigamātmakam |  satsampadāśrayācintyaśaraṇaṃ samupaimyaham ||15 ||
sugandhikusumākīrṇe prāk prātarupaviśya ca ||8 ||  vimokṣamukhasaṃśuddhau hṛdīndau maṃ prabhojvalam |
tattatkāyādi yatkarma sarvabuddhāṃstu pūjayan |  anurūpaṃ jagatkāryaṃ kuryānnityaṃ samāhitaḥ ||126 ||
yatkāyavāṅmayaṃ karma mudrāmantrātmakaṃ mahat |  tattatkarma samāsādya sarvabuddhāṃstu pūjayet ||127 ||
